title: 20% of the total beds and free treatment shall be given to EWS/persons below poverty line
clause_text: 20% of the total beds and free treatment shall be given to EWS/persons below poverty line. In addition,10% of the total number of patients in OPD shall be provided treatment at rates charged in Govt. hospitals. Such facility, proportionate to cited percentages, shall be in separate building/wing, or if not possible, on separate floor.
section: Terms and Conditions for Medical Institutions and Institutional Building

source_pdf.text_snippet: 20% of the total beds and free treatment shall be given to EWS/persons below poverty line. In addition,10% of the total number of patients in OPD shall be provided treatment at rates charged in Govt.
